title: How To Love a Woman
description: How to read a woman's mind.Have you ever wondered what goes on through a woman's mind? Do they love for real or do they just fake it? or better the games that men play just to get the women they want? This book is an exploration of both psychologies,of both sexes-the doubts the half truths and the truths-you wouldn't have to read yet another book just to understand women! Miss this,Miss out!
author: Michael Opondo
